languages.text: {n}Получив приказ от само{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, надзиратели — из страха ли, или из новообретенного мужества — пошли на прорыв и, понеся тяжелые потери, все же смогли вклиниться в ряды смутьянов. Вскоре культисты в полной мере ощутили на себе гнев людей, однажды уже вырвавших родной мир из когтей врагов Человечества.{/n}

{n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Получив приказ от само{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, надзиратели — из страха ли, или из новообретенного мужества — пошли на прорыв и, понеся тяжелые потери, все же смогли вклиниться в ряды смутьянов. Вскоре культисты в полной мере ощутили на себе гнев людей, однажды уже вырвавших родной мир из когтей врагов Человечества.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Having received orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the have charged — perhaps out of fear, or with the help of the newfound courage — and, suffering heavy losses, have managed to break into the ranks of the instigators. Soon, the cultists have felt the genuine anger of the people, who once clawed their home world out from the claws of the Archenemy.{/n}

{n}Having received orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the have charged — perhaps out of fear, or with the help of the newfound courage — and, suffering heavy losses, have managed to break into the ranks of the instigators. Soon, the cultists have felt the genuine anger of the people, who once clawed their home world out from the claws of the Archenemy.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their home world from the claws of the Archenemy, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath topple over them.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their home world from the claws of the Archenemy, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath topple over them.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行星守卫收到了舰长大人的命令。也许是出于恐惧，由也许是突如其来的勇气，他们虽然蒙受了惨重伤亡，但还是成功击垮了叛军。人类将他们的家园从人类之敌的魔爪中夺了回来。用不了多久，那些邪教徒就会发现无穷无尽的怒火朝他们扑来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行星守卫收到了舰长大人的命令。也许是出于恐惧，由也许是突如其来的勇气，他们虽然蒙受了惨重伤亡，但还是成功击垮了叛军。人类将他们的家园从人类之敌的魔爪中夺了回来。用不了多久，那些邪教徒就会发现无穷无尽的怒火朝他们扑来。{/n}
{n}行星守卫收到了舰长大人的命令。也许是出于恐惧，由也许是突如其来的勇气，他们虽然蒙受了惨重伤亡，但还是成功击垮了叛军。人类将他们的家园从混沌大敌的魔爪中夺了回来。用不了多久，那些邪教徒就会发现无穷无尽的怒火朝他们扑来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con las órdenes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, los supervisores cargaron, fuera por miedo o por un valor recién descubierto, y, a pesar de sus graves pérdidas, lograron romper las filas de los insurgentes. Ya habían salvado su mundo una vez de las garras de los enemigos de la Humanidad, y pronto los cultistas sentirían todo el peso de su ardiente furia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con las órdenes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, los supervisores cargaron, fuera por miedo o por un valor recién descubierto, y, a pesar de sus graves pérdidas, lograron romper las filas de los insurgentes. Ya habían salvado su mundo una vez de las garras de los enemigos de la Humanidad, y pronto los cultistas sentirían todo el peso de su ardiente furia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ロード・キャプテンから命令を受けた彼らは...恐れのためか、新たなに宿った勇気のためか分からないが...彼らは、大きな損害を被りながらも、なんとか反乱軍陣に侵入した。それらの者はかつて、人類の敵の爪から自分たちの故郷の惑星を引き裂かれており、間もなくカルトは、そのやり場のない怒りが自分たちに降り注ぐのを感じることになるだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・キャプテンから命令を受けた彼らは...恐れのためか、新たなに宿った勇気のためか分からないが...彼らは、大きな損害を被りながらも、なんとか反乱軍陣に侵入した。それらの者はかつて、渾沌の勢力の爪から自分たちの故郷の惑星を引き裂かれており、間もなく魔女団は、そのやり場のない怒りが自分たちに降り注ぐのを感じることになるだろう。{/n}
{n}ロード・キャプテンから命令を受けた彼らは...恐れのためか、新たなに宿った勇気のためか分からないが...彼らは、大きな損害を被りながらも、なんとか反乱軍陣に侵入した。それらの者はかつて、渾沌の勢力の爪から自分たちの故郷の惑星を引き裂かれており、間もなく魔女団は、そのやり場のない怒りが自分たちに降り注ぐのを感じることになるだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir reçu les ordres {mf|du seigneur|de la seigneure}-capitaine, les contremaîtres chargent... par peur, sans doute, ou peut-être grâce à un nouvel élan de courage. Malgré de lourdes pertes, ils réussissent à briser les lignes des insurgés. Bientôt, les cultistes sentent la terrible colère de ceux qui ont réussi à reprendre leur monde des mains des ennemis de l'humanité...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir reçu les ordres {mf|du seigneur|de la seigneure}-capitaine, les contremaîtres chargent... par peur, sans doute, ou peut-être grâce à un nouvel élan de courage. Malgré de lourdes pertes, ils réussissent à briser les lignes des insurgés. Bientôt, les cultistes sentent la terrible colère de ceux qui ont réussi à reprendre leur monde des mains des ennemis de l'humanité...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem sie Befehle des Lord Captains selbst erhalten hatten, griffen die Aufseher an ... vielleicht aus Angst, vielleicht aus einem neu gefundenen Mut. Obwohl sie schwere Verluste erlitten, gelang es ihnen, die Reihen der Aufständischen zu durchbrechen. Diese Leute hatten ihre Heimatwelt schon einmal aus den Klauen der Feinde der Menschheit befreit, und bald würden die Kultisten ihren ungebändigten Zorn zu spüren bekommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem sie Befehle des Lord Captains selbst erhalten hatten, griffen die Aufseher an ... vielleicht aus Angst, vielleicht aus einem neu gefundenen Mut. Obwohl sie schwere Verluste erlitten, gelang es ihnen, die Reihen der Aufständischen zu durchbrechen. Diese Leute hatten ihre Heimatwelt schon einmal aus den Klauen der Feinde der Menschheit befreit, und bald würden die Kultisten ihren ungebändigten Zorn zu spüren bekommen.{/n}

{n}Nachdem sie Befehle vom Lord Captain selbst erhalten hatten, stürmten sie los — vielleicht aus Angst, vielleicht aus einem neu gefundenen Mut. Obwohl sie schwere Verluste erlitten, gelang es ihnen, die Reihen der Aufständischen zu durchbrechen. Diese Leute hatten schon einmal ihre Heimatwelt den Klauen des Erzfeinds entrissen, und bald sollten die Kultisten spüren, wie ihr ungestillter Zorn über sie hinwegfegte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lord Kaptan'ın bizzat verdiği emir, gözetmenleri ya korkutmuş ya da cesaretlendirmiş olacak ki hücuma geçtiler. Ağır kayıplar görmelerine karşın asilerin saflarını bozmayı başardılar. İnsanlar, evleri olan bu dünyayı daha evvel İnsanlığın düşmanlarının pençesinden bir defa kurtarmıştı zaten. Şimdiyse dinmemiş öfkeleri sel olup tarikatçılara çarpacaktı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After receiving orders from the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the overseers charged — perhaps out of fear, perhaps owing to some newfound courage — and, despite suffering heavy losses, managed to break the ranks of the insurgents. The people had once already ripped their homeworld from the claws of the enemies of Humanity, and soon the cultists would feel their unsated wrath crash down upon them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lord Kaptan'ın bizzat verdiği emir, gözetmenleri ya korkutmuş ya da cesaretlendirmiş olacak ki hücuma geçtiler. Ağır kayıplar görmelerine karşın asilerin saflarını bozmayı başardılar. İnsanlar, evleri olan bu dünyayı daha evvel İnsanlığın düşmanlarının pençesinden bir defa kurtarmıştı zaten. Şimdiyse dinmemiş öfkeleri sel olup tarikatçılara çarpacaktı.{/n}
